properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM P_REG ORDER BY PR_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM P_REG WHERE PR_CATEGORY = ?
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM P_REG WHERE PR_CATEGORY = ? ORDER BY PR_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
